title: [K-12] Project-Based Social Learning Design Utilizing Computer-Based Assessment (CBA)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer application skills and social studies basic concepts understanding
context.additional_context: Enhancing learning engagement and performance analysis via computer-based assessments in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% performance in formative assessments using Competency-Based Assessment (CBA) for project topic analysis.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans through analysis of weekly Virtual Learning Environment (VLE) access time.
Learners can propose at least three improvement plans for project deliverables by synthesizing peer feedback and CBA results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
